settings.title: GIVING BACK IS PART OF WHO WE ARE
settings.text: The Everyday Mother exists because of the community that supports us. From the doctors and nurses who cared for Little Richie in the NICU, to the designer community that rallied around Jackie when she launched EM, we wouldn't be where we are if it weren't for YOU. Giving back is woven into every aspect of our company, which means each time you place an order, you give back, too.

settings.title: NICU DONATIONS
settings.text:
For every 0 books sold, we donate one Mini to the NICU in the Cohen Children's Medical Center. The NICU in CCMC is where Jackie's son stayed for 99 days following his birth.

Additionally, when a customer returns an order, we often donate their return to a NICU family. 

To date, we've donated 2,500+ books to NICUs.

settings.title: ALL CHILDREN DESERVE SUCCESS
settings.text: In 2018 we began our partnership with ACDS's Day Hab program. The program offers young adults with disabilities the opportunity to volunteer with community companies. Participants gain work exposure, life skills, work readiness skills, and social skills. The participants at ACDS assemble all of our ribbon page holders, add-on page packs, stickers, notepads, and more.

settings.title: ANNUAL ARTIST'S CHARITIES
settings.text:
On behalf of our winning Limited Edition artists, The Everyday Mother donates $1 for every artist book sold, to the charity of that artist's choice.

Organizations include: Cedar Valley Humane Society, Natural Resources Defense Council, ASPCA, Feeding America West Michigan, NAACP, Good Neighbors, Havaheart Rescue, and The Loveland Foundation.
